title: Which Squid Game Character Are You?

questions.q: What would you do if your friend is in danger?
What is the most important thing to win the game?
What would you do first if you got a lot of money?
How do you act in a crisis?
What is your role among friends?

sung.name: Seong Gi-hun
sung.desc: You are Seong Gi-hun! Warm-hearted and righteous, you never lose hope even in tough times.

frontman.name: Front Man
frontman.desc: You are the Front Man! Cool-headed and logical, you quickly analyze situations and show leadership.

kang.name: Kang Dae-ho
kang.desc: You are Kang Dae-ho! Strong and persistent, you overcome any adversity with courage.

cho.name: Cho Hyun-joo
cho.desc: You are Cho Hyun-joo! Smart and clever, you find solutions calmly even in crises.

kim.name: Kim Jun-hee
kim.desc: You are Kim Jun-hee! Quiet but reliable, you are a trustworthy presence for everyone.

park.name: Park Yong-sik
park.desc: You are Park Yong-sik! Cheerful and energetic, you brighten up those around you.
